ResearchProjectDef.label: Automated Farming Technique
ResearchProjectDef.description: An agricultural drone is an unmanned aerial vehicle used to help optimize agriculture operations, increase crop production, and monitor crop growth. Sensors and digital imaging capabilities can give farmers a richer picture of their fields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Farming Techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further Improvements to agricultural drones have made them more efficient and they can now haul harvest to storage or belts. This also unlocks sprinklers which boost crop speed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Farming Techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: With advanced use of Mechanites and improved Ai control, Cultivators can now work even without drones or with a buffed drone version. Sprinklers also work faster now.
